resources.string: You received a new request on your %1$s by %2$s.
Your request on %1$s was deleted. If you didn\'t delete it, it means the owner rejected your request.
Rent has started between you and %2$s for the tool %1$s.
Your rent for the tool %1$s has ended. You can now send a review on %2$s.
We reviewed the case for the tool %1$s and decided it was indeed damaged. Please organize a meeting to agree on a compensation price and deliver the tool.
We reviewed the case for the tool %1$s and decided it was not damaged. Please organize a meeting to deliver the tool.
